function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of shocks through global value chains (GVCs)","Impact":"Disruptions in supply chains of essential goods and medical products","Mitigation":"Improving risk preparedness and international cooperation","Technologies":"Supply chain monitoring and tracking technologies","People":"Businesses, governments, international organizations","Owner":"Businesses, governments, international organizations"},{"Description":"Disruptions in GVCs due to re-localisation policy","Impact":"Decreased economic efficiency and stability, less ability to cushion shocks through trade","Mitigation":"Improving risk preparedness, international cooperation, and trade resilience","Technologies":"Trade resilience technologies, risk analysis tools","People":"Businesses, governments, international organizations","Owner":"Businesses, governments, international organizations"},{"Description":"Risks and instability associated with international fragmentation of production","Impact":"Risks and instability in global value chains","Mitigation":"International cooperation, risk preparedness, and improvement of supply chain resilience","Technologies":"Supply chain resilience technologies, risk assessment tools","People":"Businesses, governments, international organizations","Owner":"Businesses, governments, international organizations"}]}
